basic_info.description_header: Hello and welcome to my Page!
basic_info.description:
I love hiking, traveling, running but mostly spending time with my family and friends. I was born in Boulder, Colorado and grew up just outside in the town of Broomfield. I attended Colorado State University where I met my future wife, Linnia. 
 
 After college, Linnia and I moved to Portland, OR and 2 years later she started Veterinary school at Oregon State University. We spent 2 years in Salem, OR followed by 2 years in Corvallis, OR where Linnia became a veterinarian! 
 
 After graduation we decided to live in New York City and travel the world. We found a small apartment on the Upper West Side of Manhattan and in the end, we stayed for 5 fun filled years. 
 
 We then decided to start a family. We moved out to Huntington, Long Island for 1 year before moving back to Colorado to be closer to grandparents.  We settled in a house north of Denver and now have 2 young energetic boys, a dog named Yeppi Queso, and a steady stream of foster kittens and dogs.

projects.title: Blockchain
projects.description: This is a sandbox I am using to learn Blockchain.  So far I have created a DAN Token and faucet, and the start of a smart ticketing app!  This is deployed against the Ropsten Test Network if you want to try it out.

classes.title: BLOCKCHAIN SPECIALIZATION
classes.description: Blockchain Basics and Smart Contracts, Decentralized Applications (Dapps) on various Blockchain Platforms.

classes.title: PROGRAMMING WITH GOOGLE GO SPECIALIZATION
classes.description: Class 1 - Getting Started with Go Class 2; - Functions, Methods, and Interfaces Class 3; - Concurrency in Go;

classes.title: TYPESCRIPT - LEARN THE FUNDAMENTALS
classes.description: Understand basics of Typescript, Learn advanced types and use them, and Write classes and understand OOP principles.

classes.title: CHAINLINK SMART CONTRACT DEVELOPER BOOTCAMP
classes.description: Wrote smart contracts using Solidity. Connected contracts to real-world data. Worked with Hardhat development environment.

classes.title: ETHEREUM BLOCKCHAIN DEVELOPER BOOTCAMP WITH SOLIDITY (2021)
classes.description: Building Solidity Projects in Remix. Become Proficient In Advanced Development With Truffle & Teams. Understand Blockchain and Web3 Technology.

classes.title: CRYPTOZOMBIES - SOLIDITY
classes.description: Interactive Solidity Coding Lessons, Interactive Solidity Coding Lessons, Creating a DApp

classes.title: SCALA - ROCK THE JVM
classes.description: Advanced Scala & Functional Programming, Scala 3 & Functional Programming Essentials, Scala at Light Speed, and Akka Essentials with Scala

classes.title: NATURAL LANGUAGE PROCESSING (NLP)
classes.description: Sentiment analysis, Summarization, dialogue state tracking. Conversational chat-bot that assists with searching on StackOverflow. Part of the Advanced Machine Learning Specialization.

classes.title: DEEP LEARNING A-Z AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE A-Z
classes.description: Artificial, Convolutional, and Recurrent Neural Networks.  Make a virtual Self Driving Car using Deep Q-Learning.  Building an AI to win in a simple game.

classes.title: MATHEMATICS FOR MACHINE LEARNING: LINEAR ALGEBRA
classes.description: Vectors are objects that move around space, Matrices in Linear Algebra, Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors.

classes.title: CHATBOT - DIALOGFLOW
classes.description: Chatbot for Website with React and Node.js interacting with DialogFlow.  Use of nodejs, react, Heroku and GIT. Interacting and customizing NLP with DialogFlow.

classes.title: BLAZOR BATTLES!
classes.description: Blazor WebAssembly Full Stack Bootcamp with .NET 5.  Build a complete web application with Blazor WebAssembly.  Forms in Blazor WebAssembly with screen Validation.
